svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Per capita plastic waste vs. GDP per capita, 2010
Per capita plastic waste generation rate (measured in kilograms per person per day) versus gross domestic product
Source: Jambeck et al. (2015) & World Bank – WDI
